name: Mourners in Mourning
description:
As a good mourner [ Plañidera in spanish*] you must mourn the dead who have not achieved eternal rest and get the highest score in record time. · A characteristic artistic style that reminds us of nightmares in winter ... ·An original soundtrack that makes you dance with a chill down your back. ·At the moment, it's a game for one person... But only for a short time! We have fallen in love with our game, so we will continue to develop it to have a better game for our most anticipated date of the year:
Halloween!
For our next Update we will add:

· A few more maps. · A more atmospheric environment · The most expected mode: MULTIPLAYER LOCAL.



Stay tuned because this week we will release the patch.
